title: Learning AssertJ: Null ain't Blank
summary: As programmers, we probably use strings more than any other type of data structure. The cross-language String environment is characterized by shared vocabulary and well-established concepts. And it is especially important to follow these established naming conventions when it comes to null string...

title: The Purpose of JWT: Stateless Authentication
summary: The demand for reliable and effective authentication methods has increased in the modern, distributed, and fast-paced digital world. Stateless authentication solutions are being used by developers and identity providers to deliver secure and scalable single sign-on solutions. JSON Web Token (JWT)...
